messages.content:
User Prompt:
    How can I add a new employee record?

    User's current screen HTML source:
Transferred to rag_agent, adopting the role of rag_agent immediately.

To add a new employee record, you can navigate to the 'Add New Employee' page. On this page, you will be able to onboard a new employee by capturing their basic information (Employee ID, Full Name, Date of Joining, Department, Designation, Employment Type, Manager Name) and contact information (Email, Phone, Role, Address). After entering the details, click on 'Save Employee'.

You can access this page via:
*   Dashboard Quick Actions
*   From the left navigation menu item "Manage Employees"
*   By clicking "Add Employee" on the top right of the Employee Management page.

➡️ To add a new employee, click here: [Add Employee](http://localhost:4200/employees/add)
Transferred to user, adopting the role of user immediately.
